review: Love this addition to tv entertainment. It is so easy to use and gives easy access to so many movies and tv series. Glad I'm not connecting my laptop to the tv anymore.
author: Sunmoonstars19

review: You had to pay for every show
author: john maloney

review: The Fire Stick I find a bit tedious to navigate as compared to Roku, which is user friendly and a breeze to use. I have only had the Fire Stick for about a week and will get use to the navigation as time goes on I am sure.
author: Tracie Craig
